content: rickrack socks by nicole simmons simple zigzag colourwork reminds me of the rickrack in my mother s sewing kit and a squishy textured pattern makes for a forgiving fit materials approximately 100 g of fingering weight sock yarn in main colour approximately 20 g of fingering weight sock yarn in contrast colour sample size large used 92 g of campfiber yarns sleek and strong fingering in dark horse for main colour and 11 g of campfiber yarns vibrant 80/20 in tulip for contrast colour one set of 2 25 mm us size 1 double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge one set of 2 5 mm us size 1 5 double pointed needles or one size larger than your other set darning needle stitch markers gauge 16 stitches and 24 rounds = 2 inches in stockinette stitch with smaller needles sizes small medium large extra large to fit approximately 7 8 9 10 inch foot circumference choose the size that fits for the ribbing you will adjust your gauge for the colourwork sections © 2021 nicole simmons
